VEC.Q: How many labels are in this radar chart?
How many dimensions are in this radar chart?

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Research Investment Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Research Investment Rate is Employment Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Employment Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Research Investment Rate is Graduation Rate.

SRP.Q: On the Research Investment Rate, is the point for North Jenniferview Academy inside or outside the point for West Emily University?
SRP.A: On the Research Investment Rate, the point for North Jenniferview Academy is outside the point for West Emily University.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Citation Rate} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of North Jenniferview Academy?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Citation Rate}, while the weakest aspect is{ Further Education Rate}.

VPR.Q: On dimension Further Education Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Further Education Rate, label {North Jenniferview Academy} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Employment Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Employment Rate, label {West Emily University} scores the lowest.

VE.Q: What is the value of West Emily University on the Research Investment Rate in the radar chart?

EVJ.A: The maximum value of North Jenniferview Academy across all dimensions is {28}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value of label West Emily University across all dimensions in the radar chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum value of West Emily University across all dimensions is {32}.

NC.Q: For North Jenniferview Academy, which dimension has a higher score: Discipline Coverage Rate or Research Investment Rate?
NC.A: {Research Investment Rate} has a higher score than Discipline Coverage Rate for North Jenniferview Academy.

NC.Q: On Employment Rate, which label has a higher score: West Emily University or the North Jenniferview Academy?

MSR.Q: For North Jenniferview Academy, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: North Jenniferview Academy most needs to improve its {Further Education Rate}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the strongest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the strongest overall capability is {North Jenniferview Academy}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the weaknest overall capability across all labels?
